name: Nazia Ahmed
bio:
Nazia is a sophomore majoring in Neuroscience. She works as a Research Assistant in the Thompson Lab and as a 
	          Medical Scribe at the Baylor University Medical Center. She has also worked at the Robotics Institute at Carnegie 
	          Mellon University, and has spent several yers as a math tutor for youth in the Dallas area. Nazia aspires to contribute 
	          a biological perspective to AI, and is passionate about inspiring youth to pursue STEM fields.
